content:
I am a Zulip contributor and working on Zulip's math block and inline expression quoting and copy pasting.
Here is the work I've merged recently:
https://github.com/zulip/zulip/pull/32629
https://github.com/zulip/zulip/pull/33351
https://github.com/zulip/zulip/pull/33345
https://github.com/zulip/zulip/pull/33327

Right now I am working to make the copy pasting experience better.
Here is the relevant PR: https://github.com/zulip/zulip/pull/33604 and CZO thread

I'd like to get feedback from this community and will be happy if someone could test it.
Thanks.
We'll test the PR on our side with some math examples from this community. :) Will let folks over here know when everything is expected to be working, and future bugs should be reported.
